column2: the [leader.GetPrimaryTitle.GetNameNoTier] are a warrior order devoted to protecting the Old Ways of the [leader.GetFaith.GetName] faith against change
column4: and foreign faiths.\n\nFor my piety and virtue
column5: [leader.GetTitledFirstName] has sent me a choice of two retainers: [retainer_a.GetFirstName]
column7: fp1_jomsvikings.0001.desc.wrathful0":"who once tore a bear clean in two
column9: fp1_jomsvikings.0001.desc.arrogant0":"who would have been the next [leader.GetTitleAsNameNoTooltip]
column10: fp1_jomsvikings.0001.desc.brave0":"who beat a troll in a fist-fight
column11: fp1_jomsvikings.0001.desc.ambitious0":"who wishes to die the most glorious death ever
column14: fp1_jomsvikings.0001.desc.stubborn0":"who tore down a mountain stone by stone
column16: fp1_jomsvikings.0001.desc.vengeful0":"who has never let a grudge go unavenged
column17: fp1_jomsvikings.0001.desc.viking0":"who kills ten peasants each day abroad
column19: fp1_jomsvikings.0001.desc.outro0":"as well as [leader.GetHerHis] compliments for my devotion.\n\nOne shall stay
column20: and the other return to the [leader.GetPrimaryTitle.GetNameNoTierNoTooltip]."

column1: fp1_jomsvikings.0011.desc.intro0:"Disaster! A lightning raid by [leader.GetTitledFirstName] of the [leader.GetPrimaryTitle.GetNameNoTier] on [target_county.GetNameNoTier] threatens to set half the county ablaze!\n\n"
fp1_jomsvikings.0011.desc.ideological_reformist0:"Branding [ROOT.Char.GetFaith.GetName] a foul perversion of the faith of our ancestors
column2: these accursed pirates are slaughtering our [ROOT.Char.GetFaith.PriestNeuterPlural] en masse
column4: and claim to be doing all of it in the name of [leader.GetFaith.HighGodName]!"

column2: these pirates consider [ROOT.Char.GetFaith.GetReligion.GetName] to be a threat to their way of life. More than merely gathering plunder
column5: and screaming bloody murder about their false gods."

column1: fp1_jomsvikings.0011.desc.economic0:"Though the [leader.GetPrimaryTitle.GetNameNoTierNoTooltip] bear no particular grudges against a [ROOT.Char.GetFaith.GetAdherentName] like myself
column2: they still depend on plunder and raiding to survive
column3: and my lands are a tempting target. Perhaps... perhaps paying them a heavy gafol could yet spare my subjects?"

column1: fp1_jomsvikings.0011.desc.outro0:"\n\nThere's no time to raise an army. I can strike with whatever forces I have to hand
column2: or I can grit my teeth till they leave."

column1: fp1_jomsvikings.0011.a.tt_success0:"The pirates are cut off and destroyed"
fp1_jomsvikings.0011.c0:"`Gather the gafol; it's cheaper in the long run."
fp1_jomsvikings.0011.d0:"How is this anything but a local problem?"
fp1_jomsvikings.0021.desc0:"It's with some suspicion that I receive a delegation of disorderly thugs from the [leader.GetPrimaryTitle.GetNameNoTier]
column2: presenting a letter from [leader.GetTitledFirstName].\n\nFierce reavers and plunderers both at sea and on land
column3: these religious fundamentalists are some of the most notorious and deadly pirates in the world.\n\nLike any good [ROOT.Char.GetFaith.GetAdherentName]
column4: I've listened to the stories of their piety and prowess with a mixture of awe and fear. Now it seems their [leader.GetTitleAsNameNoTooltip] is offering me command of this gaggle of volunteers
column5: provided I use them to raid and plunder for [ROOT.Char.GetFaith.PantheonTerm]."

column1: fp1_jomsvikings.0021.c0:"I prefer my soldiers a bit more... disciplined."
# Jomsvikings challenge a Dishonourable Norse Pagan Ruler to Holmgang:""
fp1_jomsvikings.0041.desc0:"#EMP [ROOT.Char.GetFirstNameNoTooltip]#!!"" Howls [leader.GetTitledFirstName] as [leader.GetSheHe] bursts into my throne room
column2: half-clothed.\n\n""Your sinful ways and flagrant dishonor are a disgrace to [leader.GetFaith.GetAdherentNamePlural] everywhere
column3: and the [leader.GetPrimaryTitle.GetNameNoTier] will no longer stand for it! No excuses
column8: ready to make a move on the intruder at a moment's notice.\n\nWhatever I do
column9: word of my actions will doubtless carry out over the world."""

column1: fp1_jomsvikings.0041.a0:"I'll send you to Valhöll with a smile!"
fp1_jomsvikings.0041.b0:"You were a fool to come alone. Guards!"
fp1_jomsvikings.0041.b.tt_success0:"[leader.GetTitledFirstName] is shackled & hauled off to the dungeon"
fp1_jomsvikings.0041.c0:"You know you're just a pretentious pirate
fp1_jomsvikings.0044.desc0:"With [leader.GetTitledFirstName] slumped lifeless at my feet
column2: the throne room becomes deathly silent. Nary so much as a whisper can be heard
column3: no breathing save my own ragged gasps.\n\nQuietly
column4: I pull my clothes back on.\n\nOne by one
column5: I make eye contact with each and every person still in here."

column1: fp1_jomsvikings.0044.a0:"Anyone #EMP else#! want to have a go?"
fp1_jomsvikings.0044.b0:"The justness of my rule is proven once more!"
fp1_jomsvikings.0044.c0:"This simply shows how unworthy a faith [leader.GetFaith.GetNameNoTooltip] is..."
fp1_jomsvikings.1001.desc.intro0:"With the fall of their last fortress
fp1_jomsvikings.1001.desc.reformed_asatru_exists0:"Despite their best efforts at holding back the tide of change
column3: as it did to Christianity and Islam before it.\n\nWhether the reformists win out or the faithful fall foreign beliefs

column2: they were simply not enough to hold back the tide of foreign faiths

column1: fp1_jomsvikings.1001.desc.outro0:"it now seems inevitable that [leader.GetFaith.GetName] is doomed to the waste heap of history."
fp1_jomsvikings.1001.a.tt0:"The Jomsvikings will no longer hand out boons to the pious"
fp1_jomsvikings.1001.b.tt0:"The Jomsvikings will no longer reave unbelievers"
